results.content:
After following the instructors step by step, my website speed actually was slower. She left out some key follow up instructions on how to resolve them if X, Y & Z happens. Well, not everyone will have the same build or concerns but key fundamentals with follow up would help a long way. She agrees less plugins would be better and faster but yet she recommends a significant amount of plugins to download. 

I posted Notes and emailed her for over 1 week and no response.

results.content:
I have enjoyed this course so far, just as I have enjoyed a couple of other courses by this same instructor.

For anyone needing to learn the topics offered in her courses, I highly recommend enrolling as it seems most likely that you will be delighted as I have been.

This instructor is one of the best presenters that I have experienced via Udemy courses.
It is worthy of mention that even though she is very obviously native to another country - she does a wonderful job of speaking english very clearly.

The material presented is pertinent, useful & helpful.

There is no selling being snuck in either - which is quite refreshing as compared with other so-called 'courses' which are merely sales webinars made to get students to go buy whatever is being pitched, or to join the presenter's list to get even more sales pitches. 

My thanks to Rihab for doing such good works in the courses as well as the willingness to communicate with her students !!
